Module com.example.dfaminimization
Package com.example.dfaminimization.model.DFA

Class MealyMachine

java.lang.Object
com.example.dfaminimization.model.DFA.Machine
com.example.dfaminimization.model.DFA.MealyMachine
public class MealyMachine extends Machine
Class that represents a Mealy type automata in which output symbols are associated with transitions. Output depends on the state and transition.
